Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We kindly propose an offer of $20000 for this product. We understand that its true worth may vary depending on your specific needs and application, but we are confident that this price reflects its superior value. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
